title: Power Outage Analysis
description: ​Power outages have become an increasingly pressing concern due to their frequency and impact on modern society. In the predictive analysis of this project, I will predict the causes of power outage based on other related factors.

title: C++ Path Tracing Render
description: This is a path tracing render implemented with C++. Implemented sophisticated rendering techniques including Multiple Importance Sampling (BRDF sampling + light sampling), microfacet BRDF, Monte Carlo Algorithm to simulate realistic light interactions.

title: Distribution of FPro Scores by Store
description: In this visualization, a Kernel Density Estimate (KDE) plot was chosen to compare the distributions of FPro scores across three grocery stores: Target, Walmart, and Whole Foods.

title: N-gram Model
description: Fetched and tokenized large text corpora using custom Python scripts with requests & regex. Built multiple statistical language models (Uniform, Unigram, N-gram) to handle large text (e.g. Homer’s epic) in under 20 seconds.

title: Heart Disease Prediction Model
description: Engineered multiple heart disease classification models based on health metrics, including Logistic Regression, SVM and XGBoost, achieving a prediction accuracy of 92%.
